name: Alien Meteor Dodge
description:
"Alien Meteor Dodge" (Indie Game)

Be the alien that dodges meteors from the sky in this Christmas themed low into fast pasted game that tests your perfect timing in staying alive the longest. Can you stay alive in this game?

First before you download:
This game is released with some updates but we will keep you up to date on our Facebook page.
Link to the page: https://www.facebook.com/LeapingGames/

{How to play}

Move Left: A

Move Right: D
